column1: Name: AI Theta Pro Long-Distance Lens
Specifications: "Long-distance lens with enhanced low-light performance and dynamic range that connects to an AI Theta Hub."
Exceptional image quality with superb low-light performance and enhanced dynamic range
Ideal for capturing detail to secure business critical spaces such as retail point of sale
Includes Standard Flush Mount for flat ceiling or wall mounting
Compatible with AI Theta Pro Mount"
"Ambient operating temperature": "0 to 40° C (32 to 104° F)"
